title: Death

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bring forth the Apocalypse the following night that you transform.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All living players except you will die the night the Apocalypse occurs. This cannot be prevented.
- If you are hanged the day before the Apocalypse occurs, the Apocalypse will not take place and you will lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone that would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3879b
*This is a GIM role. This looks like it would be a GIM role.*
